children.description: Additional components that are rendered inside recharts RadarChart component
children.description_zh: 在 recharts RadarChart 组件中呈现的其他组件

dataKey *.description: Key of the data object for axis values

gridColor.description: Controls color of the grid lines. By default, color depends on the color scheme.
gridColor.description_zh: 控制网格线的颜色。默认情况下，颜色取决于颜色方案。

legendProps.description: Props passed down to recharts Legend component
legendProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts Legend 组件的 props

polarAngleAxisProps.description: Props passed down to recharts PolarAngleAxis component
polarAngleAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts PolarAngleAxis 组件的 props

polarGridProps.description: Props passed down to recharts PolarGrid component
polarGridProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts PolarGrid 组件的 props

polarRadiusAxisProps.description: Props passed down to recharts PolarRadiusAxis component
polarRadiusAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts PolarRadiusAxis 组件的 props

radarChartProps.description: Props passed down to recharts RadarChart component
radarChartProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts RadarChart 组件的 props

radarProps.description: Props passed down to recharts Radar component
radarProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts Radar 组件的 props

series *.description: Determines which data should be consumed from the data array.
series *.description_zh: 确定应使用数据数组中的哪些数据。

textColor.description: Controls color of all text elements. By default, color depends on the color scheme.
textColor.description_zh: 控制所有文本元素的颜色。默认情况下，颜色取决于颜色方案。

withLegend.description: Determines whether the legend should be displayed, false by default
withLegend.description_zh: 确定是否应显示图例，默认为 false

withPolarAngleAxis.description: Determines whether PolarAngleAxis component should be displayed, true by default
withPolarAngleAxis.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 PolarAngleAxis 组件，默认情况下为 true

withPolarGrid.description: Determines whether PolarGrid component should be displayed, true by default.
withPolarGrid.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 PolarGrid 组件，默认情况下为 true。

withPolarRadiusAxis.description: Determines whether PolarRadiusAxisProps component should be displayed, false by default
withPolarRadiusAxis.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 PolarRadiusAxisProps 组件，默认为 false
